LanguageData.GI_Jackstones_granite.label: Granite Jackstones
LanguageData.GI_Jackstones_granite.description: A "little" pieces of granite that Giants play with. For regular-sized folks, they are rocks size of their heads.
LanguageData.GI_Jackstones_granite_Thrown.label: Jackstone
LanguageData.GI_Jackstones_granite.tools.0.label: Stonefist
LanguageData.GI_Jackstones_limestone.label: Limestone Jackstones
LanguageData.GI_Jackstones_limestone.description: A "little" pieces of limestone that Giants play with. For regular-sized folks, they are rocks size of their heads.
LanguageData.GI_Jackstones_limestone_Thrown.label: Jacstone
LanguageData.GI_Jackstones_limestone.tools.0.label: Stonefist
LanguageData.GI_Javelin.label: Tusked Javelin
LanguageData.GI_Javelin.description: A colossal throwing spear made by tying tusks onto a tree trunk. It is crude, yet davastating.
LanguageData.GI_Javelin_Thrown.label: Javelin
LanguageData.GI_Javelin.tools.0.label: Shaft
LanguageData.GI_Javelin.tools.1.label: Spearhead
LanguageData.GI_Scrapmetal.label: Scrap Shrapnel
LanguageData.GI_Scrapmetal.description: A pile of scrap metals. It can thrown and scattered on to enemies. It is harder to hit the target, but quite threatening regardless.
LanguageData.GI_Scrapmetal_Thrown.label: 고철조각
LanguageData.GI_Scrapmetal.tools.0.label: 고철주먹
LanguageData.GI_Rockpillar_granite.label: Granite Pillar
LanguageData.GI_Rockpillar_granite.description: It is what would be considered to be a granite pillar by human. Pillar slinging is a popular game amongst Giants.
LanguageData.GI_Rockpillar_granite_Thrown.label: Rockpillar
LanguageData.GI_Rockpillar_granite.tools.0.label: Pillar
LanguageData.GI_Rockpillar_Marble.label: Marble Pillar
LanguageData.GI_Rockpillar_Marble.description: It is what would be considered to be a granite pillar by human. Pillar slinging is a popular game amongst Giants.
LanguageData.GI_Rockpillar_Marble_Throw.label: Rockpillar
LanguageData.GI_Rockpillar_Marble.tools.0.label: Pillar
